divs: Sighting DetailsWhile riding my ATC, @ 3:33am I parked aside the road to secure my cooler. I was looking North to East across the valley, I noticed a dim but vived glow appear! As I watched(aprrox 90sec), it brightened lifted off desert floor, paused & hovered(approx 33sec), then suddenly flew in a straight path toward the North-East dissapearing into outer-space! I have observed several similar events and 3 known 3rd kind encounters! All encounters happened in the same area of the desert, not far from my home... Thanks for reading, Dusty Roads
Summary: I saw the glow in the valley appear, brighten, lift-off, hover, fly away.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Kingman
There were no other sightings in Kingman on or around April 8th 2013
